mapper.insert: insert into application values ((select nvl(max(application_number),0)+1 from application), #{animal_number}, #{supporter_id}, #{application_title}, #{application_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'))
mapper.select: select a.*, animal_name, an.supporter_id adoptionSupporter_id from application a left outer join animal an on a.animal_number = an.animal_number where a.application_number = #{application_number}
